name: example-task
goal: Add a health check endpoint that returns server status and uptime
success_criteria: Response includes server uptime in seconds

verification.description: Run Jest test suite including new health endpoint tests

phases.name: Understand Current Setup
steps: Review existing route structure in src/routes/
Identify appropriate location for health endpoint
Check for existing health check patterns in codebase
phases.verification: Can describe where health endpoint should be added

phases.name: Implement Health Endpoint
steps: Return status and uptime in response
phases.verification: curl localhost:3000/health returns 200 with expected JSON

phases.name: Add Tests
steps: Write integration test for health endpoint
phases.verification: npm test passes with new health tests

phases.name: Final Verification
steps: Verify no regressions in existing functionality
phases.verification: All tests pass, endpoint works as expected
